column4: Reconfiguring Xserver didn't work after Automatix messed it up. I'm left with a text-only login screen. Does anybody know how I can recover?
(from console) 'sudo apt-get remove --purge xserver-xorg' then 'apt-get install xserver-xorg'
You have to remove a filre from /etc as well... then restart gdm with 'sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop', 'sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start'
I'm told after your second step that I don't have permission
